strapiPost.title: Bentonville Film Festival Kicks Off Wednesday
strapiPost.content:
The 8th annual Bentonville Film Festival (BFF) will kick off on Wednesday for a dual in-person and virtual event that will run through July 3. 

  • Get ready: The festival will feature spotlight films in addition to the selected category films, filmmaker events, coffee talks, and conversations. Tomorrow, June 21, there is a BFF Art Social for a pre-festival event of biking through Bentonville and ending with a film and discussion at Thaden. 
  • Watching together: Last year, more than 10K people were at the in-person festival and over 180K online attendees. The BFF ranks in the top 10 film festivals nationally and is known for its representation and inclusion of women, BIPOC, and people of the LGBTQ+ community.

Learn more and get tickets HERE.
